inhabit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there
inhabit.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The woods are inhabited by many wild animals.
inhabit.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Inhabit is mainly used in formal or scientific contexts. In everyday English, people usually say someone lives in a place:
Millions of people live in these shantytowns.
